Monkeypox Data Explorer: Visualizing the data produced by the World Health Organization on the 2022 monkeypox outbreak.
Monkeypox: Cumulative confirmed cases per million people
Monkeypox: Daily confirmed cases per million people
Monkeypox: Daily confirmed cases per million people
Monkeypox: Cumulative confirmed deaths per million people
Monkeypox: Daily confirmed deaths per million people
Monkeypox: Daily confirmed deaths per million people

column8:
Data on the 2022 monkeypox outbreak is collated by the World Health Organization, and is updated as new information is reported.

We fetch the latest version of the WHO data every hour, keep records up to the previous day, apply some transformations (7-day averages, per-capita adjustments, etc.), and produce a transformed version of the data, available on GitHub. This transformed data powers our Monkeypox Data Explorer on Our World in Data.
